scripts.test-unit:sepolia: yarn build && NETWORK=sepolia mocha optimism_test --timeout 0 --reporter spec --grep $TEST
scripts.test:analytics: yarn build && NETWORK=localhost mocha --timeout 0 --reporter spec --grep Analytics
scripts.test:analytics:sepolia: yarn build && NETWORK=sepolia mocha --timeout 0 --reporter spec --grep Analytics
scripts.test:optimism:wethgateway: yarn build && NETWORK=optimism mocha optimism_test --timeout 0 --reporter spec --grep WETHgateway
scripts.test:optimism:getPrices: yarn build && NETWORK=optimism mocha optimism_test --timeout 0 --reporter spec --grep getPrices
scripts.scripts:verify-tranche:sepolia: NETWORK=sepolia FUNCTION=verify-tranche npx ts-node -r dotenv/config src.ts/scripts/admin.ts
scripts.scripts:update-global-admin:sepolia: NETWORK=sepolia FUNCTION=set-global-admin npx ts-node -r dotenv/config src.ts/scripts/admin.ts
scripts.scripts:set-risk-params:sepolia: NETWORK=sepolia FUNCTION=set-risk-params npx ts-node -r dotenv/config src.ts/scripts/admin.ts
